pattern_sources.1568613597835:
def pattern(t, dt, x, y, prev_state, colors):
    color = [0, 0, 0]
    for i in range(3):
        delay = 0.05 * i
        v = x + (wave_sine(t + delay)) + wave_sine(x + 0.666 * t + delay)
        color[i] = 0.03 / wave_triangle(v)
    return color, rgb
